name: Furnace-Chan's Adventure
description:
It's a beautiful day, and Furnace-Chan just woke up- just in time to find some coal candy! But what's this?! The water buckets are already hogging it all... well, better stop them before they take it!

This game has been sitting in my projects folder for quite some time now! I think it's been 5 months? Well, it's taken this long because I'd left it at a point where it was completely finished, but missed some final touches to make it publish-worthy! Let's say I was a tad lazy! :D

But she's here now! Furnace-Chan is up and ready to burn! I hope you'll enjoy her short little adventure.

Music and SFX belong to Nintendo / HAL Laboratory
Font is called "Cute Font" by Paula Tennet.
